topics.body: It turns out, Neopets has changed ownership again, this year... I guess the thing is now a dead corpse being passed around like a bloody baton. Seriously, the franchise has long passed its zenith in 2001-3 when their site was basically the center of the Internet for children's entertainment. They've faded to obscurity long before social media had a firm hold on society.
